item.title: Fake Ghost Video Triggers Panic among Villagers in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: The Gadwal police cautioned the people not to believe in rumours that a ghost was moving in the town for the last three days.
A message in this regard was released asking the people to not to believe in such rumours and clarified that unidentified persons were circulating the rumours about the ghost with a fake video.
Gadwal Rural Sub-Inspector Ch Srikanth told Deccan Chronicle on Tuesday that unidentified persons downloaded a video and started circulating it in the local WhatsApp g...]]>
item.author: M Srinivas, About The Author
